page.title: 04THE ASLOCKTON PLAYGROUP
page.content: The Aslockton playgroup has been going for 2 years now.The playgroup is on Mondays,Wednesdays, and Friday. They take 20 children, under 5 years old, per day and they go on lots of outings to farms,parks and they go on walks.The children have lots of activites like playing in the water and sand and playing with "playdoh".The children come from all round the Whatton and Aslockton area and some come from the Bottesford area. The playgroup meets in a spare classroom in Aslockton school. It is privately run but watched over by the church.
